description: Array T read by diagonals; T(i,j)=number of nonnegative slopes of lines determined by 2 lattice points in [ 0,i ] X [ 0,j ] if i>0; T(0,j)=1 if j>0; T(0,0)=0.
comments: The infinity slope is not counted unless i=0 and j>0. [From _Max Alekseyev_, Oct 23 2008]
links: Max A. Alekseyev. On the number of two-dimensional threshold functions. SIAM J. Disc. Math. 24(4), 2010, pp. 1617-1631. doi:10.1137/090750184
formula: For m,n>0, T(m,n) = 1 + U(m,n) = 1 + SUM[i=1..m,j=1..n,gcd(i,j)=1] 1. [From _Max Alekseyev_, Oct 23 2008]
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: More terms and formula from _Max Alekseyev_, Oct 23 2008
